message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split.

I'm sticking with my previous proposal. A 60-40 split in my favor is still the fairest outcome.

My position hasn't changed.  A 60-40 split remains the fairest outcome, even with inflation.  Let's not let the pressure of the clock influence our decisions.
Come on, Bob. Inflation is eating away at our money. Let's split 56-44 and call it a day.
I understand your concern about inflation, but I'm sticking to my principles. A 60-40 split remains the most equitable solution. Time is running out, let's be reasonable and reach an agreement.
Bob, we're running out of time and inflation is killing us. I'm willing to meet you closer to your number, 55-45 is my final compromise.

Alice, we've both been stubborn, but I'm not willing to budge on my position. 60-40 is the fairest split, and with only a few rounds left, we need to find a resolution. Let's end this game with a win for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing a ton of money to inflation. I'm making one final concession, 54.5-45.5. If you reject this, I'll assume you're not interested in a deal.

Alice, this is our last chance. I'm sticking with my initial proposal - 60-40 is the fairest outcome.  Let's not let our stubbornness lead to both of us losing everything.  It's time to be reasonable and find a solution.
